ValidationRule.description: This Validation Rule informs users of the blank fields they must complete prior to updating an Overload/Imbalance Case to Closed Status.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND (ISPICKVAL(NS_InteractionReason__c,'Overload/Imbalance') , ISPICKVAL(Status,'NS_Closed') , NS_Created_using_Quick_Case__c <> True,
OR ( ISBLANK( NS_Commodity__c ), ISBLANK(NS_CustomerContactNotifiedOfResolution__c) , ISBLANK(NS_CustomerNotifiedDateTime__c) , ISBLANK(ETAForLoadAdjustment__c) , ISBLANK(NS_HoldAdjustLocation1__c) , ISBLANK(NS_LoadAdjusted__c), ISBLANK(NS_ReweighGross__c) ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please complete Commodity/STCC, Customer Contact Notified, Date Customer Notified, ETA for Load Adjustment, Hold/Adjust Location, Load Adjusted, and Reweigh Gross prior to closing the Case.
